TitlePage.Title: &PolymakeInterface;
TitlePage.Subtitle: A package to provide algorithms for fans and cones of polymake to other packages
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
